full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA GLUD MDOS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (THABS DANG RTEN 'BREL LA BRTEN PA'I, BLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG BLUD SBYIN 'DI, KOO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL DANG, RANG GI NYE 'KHOR SLOB BU NI, BLO LDAN RIG GROL LA SOGS PA'I, ,BSKUL PHYIR 'DOD LTAR CHOS RJES YI, THA SHAL BSKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS, SNGON MED SER BU'I SGRA DBYANGS KYANG, LEGS BSHAD BCOS CHONG 'DI SGRIGS PA'I, DGE BA'I MA GYUR SEMS CAN RNAMS, BLO BYUR RKYEN DANG 'BRAL 'GYUR CIG ,'DI LA MKHAS RNAMS THUG MA 'KHRIL, BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR BRGYAN DU BYON, 'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI AIR KHI PI LIG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN NO, ,CES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI SGO NAS SROG GLUD RDZONGS PHAN YON NI BLO BUR RKYEN DANG 'BRAL GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
